attributes.action: Abolish the current 2012 Logo and hold a national competition to find a replacement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current 2012 logo is a £400,000 abomination and does not reflect this great country or its sporting heritage. I propose that the current design be scrapped and a national competition be held to find a new design created by members of the public.
